actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to include Fridays among the days on which social security and SSI benefit checks may not be delivered, so as to assure (without postponing the delivery date) that the recipient of any such check will have a reasonable opportunity to cash or deposit it without delay.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title VII (Administration) of the Social Security Act to include Fridays among the days on which benefit checks under titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act may not be delivered.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to include Fridays among the days on which social security and SSI benefit checks may not be delivered, so as to assure (without postponing the delivery date) that the recipient of any such check will have a reasonable opportunity to cash or deposit it without delay.
